description.db:para: This table is used by the Call Center module to store the Call Data Records (CDRs) for all the handled calls. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;call_center.html.

column.name: caller
column.description: The SIP URI identifing the caller.

column.name: wait_time
column.description: Time (in seconds) spent by the call in queue (onhold).

column.name: pickup_time
column.description: Time (in seconds) spent by the call in ringing to the agent.

column.name: talk_time
column.description: The duration (in seconds) of the call.

column.name: flow_id
column.description: The ID of the flow the call was received on.

column.name: agent_id
column.description: The ID of the agent who picked this call (if any).

column.name: call_type
rejected
column.description: How many times the call was rejected by agents (agent not answering his phone).

column.name: fstats
